code: import React from'react';import'../stylesheets/App.scss';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CharacterDetail=function CharacterDetail(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"link__back",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"link__back--button",children:"Back"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"card__container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"card__img",src:props.character.image,alt:props.character.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"card__description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"lista",children:["Name: ",props.character.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"lista",children:["Specie: ",props.character.species]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"lista",children:["Planet: ",props.character.location]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"lista",children:["Episodes: ",props.character.episode2]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"lista",children:["Status: ",props.character.status]})]})]})]});};export default CharacterDetail;
